page.title: 09RECREATION AMONG ADULTS
page.content: We surveyed 12 men and 14 women to find out about their leisure activities. They were mainly poeple in the 25-40 age group, although 3 were about 60 years old. Mrs Starling told us the study of the{Bible}was an important part of her life. Mr Honess' hobby is{motorcycling. He enjoys repairing and refurbishing them and touring the countryside on them. Mr Reckless listed{computing}and {electronics}as his interesting hobbies. The majority of people watch T.V. for several hours each day. Of 36 families only one has no television.
